org.gridlab.gat.engine
Class GATEngineThread

        +--org.gridlab.gat.engine.GATEngineThread
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable
public class GATEngineThread
extends java.lang.Thread

An instance of this class is a Thread which periodically checks the optional directory for GAT jars and makes them available to GAT

getCpiClasses

public java.util.Map getCpiClasses()
This method returns a Map the keys of which are of type java.lang.String and contain the fully qualified path name of the various Cpi classes.

So, for example, a key would be the String

"org.gridlab.gat.io.FileCpi"

The values of the returned Map are Map's. Such a Map will contain as its keys instances of the class Preferences and as values instances of the class Class.

So, for example, a Map which is mapped to the key

"org.gridlab.gat.io.FileCpi"

is a second Map. This Map contains keys which are instances of the class Preferences and values which are instances of the class Class. Each key, a Preferences instance, will be constructed by passing an instance of the Attributes class to the Preferences constructor. This Attributes instance will correspond to a jar file in the optional packages directory which is used to construct a Cpi clas of the type

"org.gridlab.gat.io.FileCpi"

The value, a instance of type Class, corresponding to the key, an instance of type Preferences, is a Class instance corresponding to the Cpi implemented in the corresponding optional jar.

Returns:
A Map of CpiClasses
